com.hazelcast.spi.impl.operationservice.impl

Class TargetInvocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.spi.impl.operationservice.impl.TargetInvocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OperationResponseHandler, Runnable

    public final class TargetInvocation
extends Object
    A Invocation evaluates a Operation Invocation for a particular target running on top of the OperationServiceImpl.
